hero.title: Leading the Future of Healthcare
hero.description: Innovative pharmaceutical solutions for a healthier tomorrow

products.featuredDescription: Discover our range of high-quality over-the-counter medications designed to provide safe and effective relief for common health concerns.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyChooseUs.subtitle: Leading Pharmaceutical Excellence Since 1990
whyChooseUs.description: With over three decades of experience in the pharmaceutical industry, we have established ourselves as a trusted partner for healthcare providers worldwide. Our commitment to quality, innovation, and patient safety drives everything we do.

points.quality: FDA & EMA approved manufacturing facilities with GMP certification
points.research: 15% annual revenue invested in R&D for innovative solutions
points.global: Serving healthcare systems in over 50 countries globally
points.sustainability: Committed to sustainable and ethical pharmaceutical practices

mission.title: Advancing Healthcare Through Innovation
mission.description: At INNANA Pharmaceuticals, we are dedicated to transforming patient care through groundbreaking medical innovations and unwavering commitment to quality. With over three decades of scientific excellence, we develop life-changing treatments that meet the highest standards of safety and efficacy. Our mission extends beyond medicine – we strive to improve global healthcare accessibility while maintaining the trust of healthcare professionals, patients, and stakeholders worldwide. Through continuous research, ethical practices, and sustainable development, we're shaping the future of healthcare for generations to come.

area1.title: Drug Delivery Systems
area1.description: Developing innovative delivery mechanisms to enhance treatment efficacy and patient compliance.

area2.title: Chronic Disease Management
area2.description: Creating breakthrough treatments for chronic conditions affecting millions globally.

area3.title: Preventive Medicine
area3.description: Researching novel approaches to disease prevention and early intervention.

area4.title: Precision Medicine
area4.description: Advancing personalized treatment solutions based on genetic and molecular profiles.

investors.subtitle: Join us in revolutionizing the pharmaceutical industry through innovative research and development

metrics.fundingRaisedDesc: Series A funding completed in Q1 2024

overview.title: Investment Highlights
overview.p1: Our company is at the forefront of pharmaceutical innovation, developing breakthrough treatments for critical medical conditions. With a strong research pipeline and strategic partnerships, we're positioned for significant growth in the global healthcare market.
overview.p2: We focus on high-impact therapeutic areas with significant unmet medical needs, supported by a world-class team of researchers and industry experts.
overview.highlight1: Strong intellectual property portfolio with multiple patents
overview.highlight2: Experienced management team with proven track record
overview.highlight3: Clear path to market with established partnerships

cta.title: Connect with Our Investor Relations Team
cta.description: Learn more about investment opportunities and our growth strategy

ContactUsPage.title: Contact Us
ContactUsPage.subtitle: We're here to help and answer any questions you might have. Please feel free to reach out to us.

footer.companyDescription: Leading the way in innovative pharmaceutical solutions, committed to improving global health and well-being through cutting-edge medical research and development.
